resources.string: First, we need to know who you are. Please press this button to scan the barcode on your shirt. Then, the activity will immediately start.
You are not on our list for this activity, please try again
Your are ready to play, have fun !
This is not the right student! Try another one.
Please wait for the others to finish. You can also retry if you believe you can do better.
Cannot establish connection to the server. Please make sure you are connected to a network.
